name: Bottle Shooting Game 2017
description:
Want to play an interesting shooting game other than shooting animals and terrorists? Here is the new shooting experience for you, now you have to shoot bottles with glass broking sound you will love it.

Bottle Shoot is about shooting as many bottles as you can in the fixed amount of time. Only if you can do both will you become a real Bottle Hunt Master! Every round is harder, than the last. There is also bonus level you can break the bottle without obstacle such as bombs and shells.

In this interesting game you have to shoot as many bottles as you can in a limited time period. There are multiple levels which you have to complete. With every next level difficulty will also increase as compared to the precious one. There is also bonus level in which you can break the bottle with bombs and shells. High quality graphics and targeting bottles to shoot will make you play the game for hours. Bottle shooting game is a new bottle blast game play.

You have to throw the stone by swipe your finger to break the bottles. To get higher score you can use combo feature in the game. You can enjoy the bottle shoot sound and special effects while playing this Bottle shooting game.
